arts.ttl: Sam Surridge scores on PK in second-half stoppage time to lead Nashville over Real Salt Lake 2-1
arts.sum: Sam Surridge scored on a penalty kick in the first minute of second-half stoppage time to rally Nashville SC to a 2-1 victory over Real Salt Lake on Saturday night. Nashville evened the score by halftime on a goal by defender Daniel Lovitz in the 30th minute with an assist from Edvard Tagseth.
